text: Blonde Ambition is a romantic comedy movie. This is about a small town girl who moves to New York City and becomes a businesswoman. Jessica Simpson plays Katie. Rachael Leigh Cook plays Haley, and Penelope Ann Miller plays Debra. This movie was released in December of 2007. It did not do well at the box office. Category:2007 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies
title: Blonde Ambition
